item.title: Venezuela live updates: Trump reportedly suggests lengthy US oversight of Venezuela
item.description: The president of Venezuela was taken by American forces and transported to the U.S. Saturday to face federal drug charges.

item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Tensions flare in Minneapolis
item.description: Tensions are flaring in Minneapolis after an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer fatally shot a 37-year-old woman on Wednesday.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Northen lights shimmer in skies over Greenland
item.description: An airport camera in western Greenland captured the northern lights illuminating the early morning sky.

item.title: WATCH: Dancing robot gets too funky at CES
item.description: A dancing robot needed some human guidance after getting caught up in a barrier.
